name: The other side of History
description:
The other side of history is a Tower Defence game where you take the stance of a Mayan temple and thus defend it from invaders that want to steal all your gold.

The gameplay swaps between Third Person and Top down.

In Third Person you can shoot projectiles and collect loot.

In Top Down you can build towers, summon allies and deploy into the maze.

Controls:

Third Person:

Tab: Swaps to top down

Left Mouse click: Shoots projectiles

WASD + spacebar: move and jump

Top Down:

Left Mouse button for all your actions

This game was made for the UE4 Spring Jam with the theme "The other side of the Coin" in 5 days.

Made by @Wabbaboy wabbaboydev@gmail.com
